languages.title: Choose Your Preferred Programming Languages
languages.content: Please select the programming languages you are most comfortable with or interested in. You can choose multiple languages to tailor your experience on OnlyDust.

categories.title: Choose Your Favorite Categories
categories.content: To help us recommend the best projects for you, please select the categories that interest you the most. You can choose multiple categories to tailor your experience on OnlyDust.

goal.title: Your Goal
goal.content: To tailor your experience on OnlyDust, please select the main reasons why you want to join our community.

skill.title: Learn & Develop Skills
skill.content: Gain access to projects designed to enhance your skills and knowledge through continuous learning opportunities.

challenge.title: Challenge
challenge.content: Engage in projects that are complex and challenging, providing stimulating problem-solving experiences.

money.title: Earn Money
money.content: Find projects specifically aimed at offering financial rewards, allowing you to monetize your skills and efforts.

notoriety.title: Gain Notoriety
notoriety.content: Participate in projects specifically chosen to boost your reputation and visibility, showcasing your talents to a broad audience.

lookingForAJob.title: Are You Looking for a Job?
lookingForAJob.content: This will help us match you with relevant projects and potential employers.
